title: Nation’s Largest Socialist Organization Receives News That Should FRIGHTEN All Americans…
text:
You have to be pretty unintelligent to be a socialist. 
You are basically endorsing a political ideology that has never worked. 
It’s also responsible for killing millions of people.   
Not exactly a stellar record.   
But, that hasn’t stopped Bernie Sanders and other wingnuts from pushing it on impressionable young people to gain power and fortune.   
Bernie’s plan didn’t work out at the ballot box but it sure does seem to be making an impact for The Democratic Socialists of America. 
The great John Sexton has the details…

The Democratic Socialists of America (DSA) has been growing substantially over the past year according to a story in the LA Times : googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('div-gpt-ad-1448050117784-4'); }); googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('div-gpt-ad-1464204305408-1'); }); 
The surge of activism sweeping the U.S. since Donald Trump’s election has energized the nation’s largest socialist organization, which has tripled in size over the last year to claim more than 19,000 dues-paying members. That’s a record for the DSA, which was founded in 1982. googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('div-gpt-ad-1481811813211-3'); }); 
“People really felt that they had to do something to combat the incoming Trump administration,” said David Duhalde, the deputy director of the Democratic Socialists of America’s national leadership, which helps coordinate chapters spread across 40 states. “We’re not only somebody you can resist Trump with, we’re somebody you can build a better world with.” 
Not good. 
Clearly, this has nothing to do with the merits of socialism. 
This is about young people being fed debunked information from hucksters like Bernie Sanders. 
The best way to combat this?
